quizDescription: Test your knowledge of basic keyboard shortcuts for improved computer productivity.

questions.question: What keyboard shortcut is commonly used to copy selected text or files?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + C is used to copy selected items to the clipboard.

questions.question: Which keyboard shortcut is used to undo the last action in many applications?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + Z is the standard keyboard shortcut for undoing the last action.

questions.question: What keyboard shortcut is used to open the 'Find' dialog in web browsers and text editors?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + F is commonly used to open the 'Find' dialog for searching within documents.

questions.question: Which keyboard shortcut is used to close the current window or tab in most applications?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + W is used to close the current window or tab.

questions.question: What keyboard shortcut is used to paste the contents of the clipboard in many applications?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + V is used to paste the contents of the clipboard.
